Citations.Cited_Guidance: A masking is expected to be defined for at least one study role in a study design with a blinding schema that is not open label or double blind.

rule.Description: A masking is expected to be defined for at least one study role in a study design with a blinding schema that is not open label or double blind.

Outcome.Message: The study design has a blinding schema that is not open label or double blind (code is not C49659 or C15228) but there is no applicable study role that is masked.
